author: schneiml
body:
#### PR description:

This is another set of changes extracted out of the "new DQMStore" [1] project.

Here, we apply some aesthetic changes to the old `one::DQMEDAnalyzer`, to make it more consistent with the `DQMGlobalEDAnalyzer`, as well as a number of batch renames: DQM modules are no longer allowed to override `endRun` or `endLuminosityBlock`, instead `dqmEnd*` variations are provided (like we already had in some other places).

As a side effect, `DQMEDAnalyzer` and `DQMOneEDAnalyzer` are made to no longer share any code; this was not really required, and the implementations are still identical, but we might have them diverge soon. On that occasion, I also fixed the production of DQMTokens: they are not really used for anything and it was fine that they were not produced correctly, but now things are closer to how the product-based DQM will look like.

[1] https://github.com/schneiml/cmssw/tree/dqm-new-dqmstore-on-CMSSW_11_0_0_pre5

#### PR validation:

There should be no funcitonal changes, no output changes are expected.
title: DQM: Restructure the edm::one DQMEDAnalyzer base classes
